title: Vesak Day 2025
subtitle: Vesak Day 2025
description:
Join us for our annual fundraiser supporting the Buddhist Youth Association (BYA) in Vietnam. The Tâm Phùng - Đoàn Thị Bướm Scholarship Fund provides educational opportunities for underprivileged students who demonstrate academic excellence and commitment to Buddhist values.

This event brings together our community to support the next generation of Buddhist youth leaders in Vietnam. Your generous contributions will help provide scholarships, educational materials, and mentorship programs.
